name: Night of the Living Dread
description:
Shoot your way through 4 action packed levels, and use dice blocks scattered around the levels to upgrade yourself. 

- Story-

The year is 2030 and the remaining humans have created you, Eliminator V35 (E-35), a robotic killing machine to mow through zombies in order to reach and defeat Patient  Zero and stop the virus once and for all. However, you will not make it there in your current state, you must upgrade yourself using dice blocks.
